snippet: The suspect in a shooting at a victory rally for Pauline Marois, Quebec’s new separatist premier, was arraigned Thursday on 16 charges, including murder, attempted murder and possession of explosives.
abstract: Richard Henry Bain, the suspect in a shooting at a victory rally for Pauline Marois, Quebec’s new separatist premier, is arraigned on 16 charges, including murder, attempted murder and possession of explosives.
lead_paragraph: The suspect in a shooting at a victory rally for Pauline Marois, Quebec’s new separatist premier, was arraigned Thursday on 16 charges, including murder, attempted murder and possession of explosives.
